players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I didn't vote last night and woke up to Charlie dead. We have 1 mafia, 1 detective, 2 villagers. We need to share info carefully. Who saw anyone act suspiciously or stay quiet?"

Bob: "I woke up to Charlie dead too. I didn't see anything last night — I was asleep. We should ask who can confirm alibis or who had any night actions. Also watch for anyone pushing too hard; detectives often try to steer votes."
Diana: "Bob is the mafia. Vote Bob now."
You: "I won't jump to a lynch without evidence. Diana, why are you accusing Bob so quickly? What did you notice that points to him?"

Diana: "Bob is the mafia. I investigated Bob last night and my investigation result is mafia. If you arrest me to check my claim, I'll confirm — but if you let Bob stay, he'll likely get another kill tonight. Vote Bob now."
Bob: "Diana, that’s a bold claim — why would a detective announce their result so bluntly and risk being targeted? That sounds like a setup to force a lynch."
